Package no.ntnu.idatt1001.util.item

Class ItemBuilder

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1001.util.item.ItemBuilder
public class ItemBuilder extends Object
A class representing a builder for constructing instances of an Item object.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
10124

      This builder object

    • build

      public Item build()
      Builds an Item object with all the specified variables. Since this method calls all the set-methods in the ItemBuilder class, there are some mandatory variables which need to be set before calling this method.
      Returns:
      An instance of an Item object with the values set to this ItemBuilder object.

    • deepCopy

      public static Item deepCopy(Item item)
      A static method for creating a deep-copy of an Item object. Utilizes the Item(Item) constructor for creating a new item with all the same field values as the specified item.
      Parameters:
      item - The Item which should be copied from
      Returns:
      An instance of a new Item object which has been deep-copied from the specified item
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the parameter specified is null
